Ford scholars alumni survey 1 Demographics In total, there were 314 respondents. 1.1 Where do respondents live? 1.1.1 All respondents Note: Respondents who listed the exact same zip codes are spread out slightly so they donâ€™t overlap. The dots do not show not exact locations of respondents. 1.1.2 Within Oregon vs outside Oregon 72% of respondents live in Oregon. 28% live outside of Oregon. 1.1.3 By Oregon county This map shows the number of respondents per county (it only shows those who live in Oregon, obviously). Darker colors indicate higher numbers in a county. Hover over any county to see the exact number of respondents. 1.1.4 Rural In total, 36% of respondents live in zip codes TFFF considers rural. 64% live in urban zip codes. Note that this does not include those who live outside of Oregon. 1.2 Age 1.3 Education 1.3.1 Year respondents graduated from college Note that some people were confused by whether to count their undergrad or higher levels. I only included answers that were clearly for undregrad. 1.3.2 Years since graduation The following graph shows the same data, but put into groups. 1.3.3 Highest level of education 1.4 Work Principal industry (does not include those who said NA or listed other as their response). 1.5 Type of scholarship
